Title: I Love, You Love
Actors: Roman Klosowski, Iva Janzurová, Milan Jelic, Milada Jezková
Plot: Pista, a lonely bachelor, working in a Post office, takes to drinking to get over his small stature and unsightly appearance. He is hopelessly in love with his colleague Viera, who in turn is haplessly in love with Pista's friend Vinco. With fate being his adversary, he tries to make up for his situation with humor.
